AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 7 (Windows) of Permission 19/01873/OUT allowed under appeal APP/Z5630/W/20/3246194 (Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of new residential building housing 8 dwellings with associated parking, bins and cycle store (outline application to consider appearance, layout and scale)
decision_conditions: The applicant has provided insufficient detail in regards to the level of obscurity of the proposed glazing to determine whether the windows subject of condition 7 would meet the requirements of the condition and the deposited plans in support of the details application would conflict with condition 4 of planning permission 19/01873/OUT.
